mapper.insert: Insert into Customers(FirstName, LastName, Phone, Email) values (#{firstName}, #{lastName}, #{phone}, #{email})
mapper.sql: Select c.customerID as customer_id, c.FirstName as customer_firstName, c.LastName as customer_lastName, c.Phone as customer_phone, c.Email as customer_email, g.GadgetID as gadget_id, g.GadgetName as gadget_name, g.Brand as gadget_brand, g.Model as gadget_model, g.PurchaseDate as gadget_purchaseDate, from Customers c inner join Gadgets g on g.customerID = c.customerID
mapper.update: Update Customers set FirstName =#{firstName}, LastName = #{lastName}, Phone = #{phone}, Email = #{email} where CustomerID = #{customerID}
